colormatic.config.title: Colormatic Options
colormatic.config.title.subtitle: Colormatic Options
colormatic.config.option.clearSky.desc: Use the sky color for fog.
colormatic.config.option.clearVoid.desc: Don't render the void, even when below sea level.
colormatic.config.option.blendSkyLight.d: Blend sky light smoothly during sunrise and sunset.
colormatic.config.option.relativeBlockLi: The intensity of block light relative to sky light. Lower values make block light dimmer in ambient light.
